trans-unit.source: Represents an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A RepeaterItem object represents an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, such as the heading section, footer section, or a data item.
trans-unit.target: RepeaterItem 对象表示中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件，如标题部分、 页脚部分或数据项。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The data items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> object that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>都存储在控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection>可以通过使用访问的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: You can use a RepeaterItem object to programmatically access the properties of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 RepeaterItem 对象以编程方式访问中的项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>的新实例

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: 中的项的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref>控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>在控件集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a data item associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与关联的数据项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref>对象在<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: DataItem 属性用于指定或确定与其关联的数据项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性仅适用于数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>属性必须设置为`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>表示中的数据项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取中的项的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref>控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>在控件集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index number of the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ItemIndex 属性来确定中项的索引号<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A>在控件集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性仅适用于数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>属性必须设置为`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: 中的项的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref>控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>在控件集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的类型中的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemType property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ItemType 属性来确定中的项的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different item types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了各种项类型。

trans-unit.source: |Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Header|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Footer|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Item|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |AlternatingItem|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |SelectedItem|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |EditItem|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Separator|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Pager|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.|
trans-unit.target: |项目类型 |说明 | |---------------|-----------------| |标头 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件的标题部分。 | |页脚 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件的页脚部分。 | |项 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件中的项。 | |交替项 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件中的交替项。 | |SelectedItem |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件中的选定的项。 | |EditItem |为编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件中选定的项。 | |分隔符 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件的项之间的分隔符。 | |页导航 |页上选择部分的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Assigns any sources of the event and its information to the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control, if the <xref:System.EventArgs> parameter is an instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将事件和其信息的任何源分配给父<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref>控制，如果<xref:System.EventArgs>参数是的一个实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs"> </xref>。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event assigned to the parent was raised, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果分配给父引发事件，否则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex*>。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*>
